title: B's-LOVEY Anthology: BL of the Dead
original_name: B's-LOVEY アンソロジー BL・オブ・ザ・デッド
sinopse:
A collection of the "ultimate love stories" taking place in a world of zombies where a lover is "the only sustenance I have to survive this world."

(Source: ANN)

Note: Story 8 was collected in Ezuke wa Yahan, Ano Heya de.
